com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.loader
Interface IClientConnectionBuilder

public interface IClientConnectionBuilder

A method for creating an IClientFactory, which enables a bulk data loader to authenticate with and then connect to Intelligence Analysis Platform web services.

Since:
4.0

Method Summary
 IClientFactory build(String servicesURL, String userName, String password)
          Creates and returns an IClientFactory for generating clients that use the specified URL, user name, and password.
 

Method Detail

build

IClientFactory build(String servicesURL,
                     String userName,
                     String password)
Creates and returns an IClientFactory for generating clients that use the specified URL, user name, and password.

Parameters:
servicesURL - A String containing the URL of the Intelligence Analysis Platform web services.
userName - A String containing the name of a user of the Intelligence Analysis Platform.
password - A String containing the password of the user of the Intelligence Analysis Platform.
Returns:
See above.
